Assessment Report for Learners

RESEARCH DESIGN FOR INNOVATION-1

items.name: RDINNOVATION-1_Radio grid input
items.label: Please, self-asses on the scale from 1 to 6, where 1 is “not able at all” and 6 is “able to initiate and perform individually”, if you are able to:
items.reportLabel: According to your answers, you are able to

optionsHorizontal.id: 1. (K) Recognise and identify research methods, terminology and problem-solving techniques
optionsHorizontal.name: 1. Recognise and identify research methods, terminology and problem-solving techniques

optionsHorizontal.id: 2.( S) Devise imaginative and innovative solutions to research problems
optionsHorizontal.name: 2. Devise imaginative and innovative solutions to research problems

optionsHorizontal.id: 3. (S) Apply an understanding of the characteristics of quantitative and qualitative research methods in research design and practise
optionsHorizontal.name: 3. Apply an understanding of the characteristics of quantitative and qualitative research methods in research design and practise

optionsHorizontal.id: 4. (S) Plan the overall process of designing a research study from its inception to its reporting stage
optionsHorizontal.name: 4. Plan the overall process of designing a research study from its inception to its reporting stage

optionsHorizontal.id: 5. (S) Implement adequate reseach methods and techniques according to the nature of each research project
optionsHorizontal.name: 5. Implement adequate reseach methods and techniques according to the nature of each research project

items.name: RDINNOVATION-2_Radio grid input
items.label: Please, self-asses on the scale from 1 to 6, where 1 is “not able at all” and 6 is “able to initiate and perform individually”, if you are able to:
items.reportLabel: According to your answers, you are able to

optionsHorizontal.id: 1. (K) Understand communication theories applied to research
optionsHorizontal.name: 1. Understand communication theories applied to research

optionsHorizontal.id: 2. (S) Select and apply adequate communication strategies according to context and stakeholders
optionsHorizontal.name: 2. (S) Select and apply adequate communication strategies according to context and stakeholders
